original_text: ‘ Lord, our many sins show that we are guilty. 14: This part tells us what the people are saying, or what Jeremiah is saying on their behalf. But please help us, to show that you are our God. We have turned away from you many times. We have done bad things against you. ‘ Lord, our many sins show that we are guilty.
korean_text: 여호와여 우리의 죄악이 우리에게 대하여 증언할지라도 주는 주의 이름을 위하여 일하소서 우리의 타락함이 많으니이다 우리가 주께 범죄하였나이다

sentences.original_text: Lord, our many sins show that we are guilty
sentences.korean_translation: 주님, 우리의 많은 죄는 우리가 유죄임을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: 14: This part tells us what the people are saying
sentences.korean_translation: 14: 이 부분은 백성들이 무엇을 말하는지 알려줍니다

sentences.original_text: or what Jeremiah is saying on their behalf
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 예레미야가 그들을 대신하여 무엇을 말하는지 알려줍니다
